00023         function login() {
00024                 if(!$this -> input -> post('submit')) {
00025                         $data['data'] = array('errmsg' => "");
00026                         $data['main_content'] = 'login_form_view';
00027                         $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00028                 } else {
00029                         $uname = $this -> input -> post('uname');
00030                         $passwd = $this -> input -> post('passwd');
00031                         //echo "validate_login: uname=".$uname." passwd=".$passwd.".";
00032                         if($this -> users_model -> validate_user($uname, $passwd) == TRUE) {
00033                                 $this->setSessionData($uname);
00034                                 #$this->load->view('header_view');
00035                                 $data['main_content'] = 'login_validate_success';
00036                                 $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00037                         } else {
00038                                 #$this->load->view('header_view');
00039                                 $data['data'] = array('errmsg' => "Invalid Username or Password - Pleast Try Again");
00040                                 $data['main_content'] = 'login_form_view';
00041                                 $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00042                         }
00043                 }
00044                 #    $this->load->view('footer_view');
00045         }
00046 
00047         private function setSessionData($uname) {
00048                 # Set the data stored in the current session to reflect user name $uname
00049                 $userdata = $this -> users_model -> get_user_by_uname($uname);
00050                 $session_data['uname'] = $uname;
00051                 $session_data['user_id'] = $userdata['user_id'];
00052                 $session_data['role'] = $userdata['role'];
00053                 $session_data['logged_in'] = TRUE;
00054                 $this -> session -> set_userdata($session_data);
00055         }
00056 
00057         public function logout() {
00058                 $session_data['uname'] = "";
00059                 $session_data['logged_in'] = FALSE;
00060                 $session_data['role'] = 0;
00061                 
00062                 $this -> session -> set_userdata($session_data);
00063                 $this -> session -> sess_destroy();
00064 
00065                 $data['main_content'] = 'login_form_view';
00066                 $data['data'] = array(
00067                         'title'=>'Logout',
00068                         'errmsg' => "You have logged out successfully...."
00069                         );
00070                 $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00071 
00072         }

00077         function register() {
00078                 #$this->load->view('header_view');
00079 
00080                 $this -> form_validation -> set_rules('uname', 'Username', 'required');
00081                 $this -> form_validation -> set_rules('password', 'Password', 'required');
00082                 $this -> form_validation -> set_rules('passconf', 'Password Confirmation', 'required');
00083                 $this -> form_validation -> set_rules('passconf', 'Password Confirmation', 'matches[password]');
00084                 $this -> form_validation -> set_rules('email', 'Email', 'required');
00085 
00086                 if($this -> form_validation -> run() == FALSE) {
00087                         $maindata['errmsg'] = "";
00088                         $data['main_content'] = 'login_register_form.php';
00089                         $data['data'] = $maindata;
00090                         $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00091                 } else {
00092                         $uname = $this -> input -> post('uname');
00093                         $passwd = $this -> input -> post('password');
00094                         $full_name = $this -> input -> post('full_name');
00095                         $email = $this -> input -> post('email');
00096                         $role = 1;
00097                         if($this -> users_model -> uname_available($uname)) {
00098                                 // user name available - create username.
00099                                 $this -> users_model -> add_user($uname, $passwd, $full_name, $email, $role);
00100                                 $data['main_content'] = 'login_form_view';
00101                                 $data['errmsg'] = "You have registered successfully - please log in...";
00102                                 $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00103                         } else {
00104                                 // invalid user name
00105                                 $maindata['errmsg'] = "Invalid user name - please try again.";
00106                                 $data['data'] = $maindata;
00107                                 $data['main_content'] = 'login_register_form';
00108                                 $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00109                         }
00110                 }
00111                 #    $this->load->view('footer_view');
00112         }

00114         public function edit_user($user_id =null) {
00121                 #   $this->load->view('header_view');
00122 
00123                 /* If the user_id is not specified in the URL, this function must have
00124                  * been called by the form, so the user_id is in the POST data.
00125                  */
00126                 if($user_id == null) {
00127                         foreach($_POST as $key => $value) {
00128                                 $post_data[$key] = $this -> input -> post($key);
00129                         }
00130                         $user_id = $this -> input -> post('user_id');
00131                 }
00132                 $this -> form_validation -> set_rules('passconf', 'Password Confirmation', 'matches[password]');
00133 
00134                 $db_data = $this -> users_model -> get_user_by_id($user_id);
00135 
00136                 /* If we have pressed the 'submit' button, we should use the POST
00137                  * data to re-populate the form if necessary, otherwise we need to
00138                  * provide the current data, extracted from the database
00139                  */
00140                 if($this -> input -> post('submit')) {
00141                         $data = $post_data;
00142                 } else {
00143                         $data = $db_data;
00144                 }
00145 
00146                 if($this -> form_validation -> run() == FALSE) {
00147                         if(($data['user_id'] == $this -> session -> userdata('user_id')) or ($this -> session -> userdata('role') == 2)) {
00148 
00149                                 $data['data'] = $data;
00150                                 $data['main_content'] = 'login_edit_user';
00151                                 $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00152                         } else {
00153                                 $maindata = array('title' => 'ERROR', 'msg' => 'Only an administrator can change the configuration of a different user.');
00154                                 $data['data'] = $maindata;
00155                                 $data['main_content'] = 'login_message';
00156                                 $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00157 
00158                         }
00159                 } else {
00160                         $uname = $this -> input -> post('uname');
00161                         $passwd = $this -> input -> post('password');
00162                         $full_name = $this -> input -> post('full_name');
00163                         $email = $this -> input -> post('email');
00164                         $role = $this -> input -> post('role');
00165                         // user name available - create username.
00166                         $this -> users_model -> update_user($user_id, $uname, $passwd, $full_name, $email, $role);
00167                         $this ->setSessionData($uname);
00168                         $data['main_content'] = 'message_view';
00169                         $data['data'] = array(
00170                                         'title'=>'User Data Updated',
00171                                         'msg'=>'User Data Updated Successfully.'
00172                                         );
00173                         $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00174                 }
00175                 #    $this->load->view('footer_view');
00176         }

00178         public function list_users() {
00179                 $data['query'] = $this -> users_model -> get_users();
00180                 ;
00181                 #   $this->load->view('header_view',$data);
00182                 if($this -> session -> userdata('role') == 2) {
00183                         $data['data'] = $data;
00184                         $data['main_content'] = 'login_list_users';
00185                         $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00186                 } else {
00187                         $data['data'] = array('title' => 'ERROR', 'msg' => 'Only an administrator can list users.');
00188                         $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $data);
00189                 }
00190                 #    $this->load->view('footer_view');
00191 
00192         }

00194         public function isValidUser() {
00195                 if($this -> session -> userdata('logged_in') && 
00196                 ($this ->session -> userdata('role') >= 1)) 
00197                         return TRUE;
00198                  else 
00199                         return FALSE;
00200         }
